reviewText: excellent and informative movie. everyone should watch this including the anti gun idiots and it should be required education in school.
A must watch video. Ron Paul is in it too.
Received product as described and expeditiously. A++++
If you love the right to bear arms you will love this great documentary

Every American that cares about the future of this country should watch this ! If you care about your children & grandchildren watch this & then start making your political leaders follow the Constitution !
What the second amendment is REALLY about.
Great movie. Very informative.  I would highly recommend this movie for anyone whois interested in their rights.  I ordered it for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it.

Eye opening movie/documentary. Loved it. Always looking for historical information on the intended framework of this great nation. Well done. Recommend for family and teaching. Know your history or doom your future...
